# Battery Technology Readness Level

Title: Diagram for battery tech readiness
---

```mermaid

flowchart LR
    A[TRL 1: Basic Research] --> B[TRL 2: Applied Research] 
    B --> C[TRL 3: Proof of Concept\nExample: Solid-state batteries]
    C --> D[TRL 4: Technology Validation\nExample: Lithium-air batteries]
    D --> E[TRL 5: Early Commercialization\nExample: Lithium-ion batteries]
    E --> F[TRL 6: Full-scale Commercialization\nExample: Lead-acid batteries]
    F --> G[TRL 7: Widespread Commercialization\nExample: Nickel-metal hydride batteries]
    G --> H[TRL 8: Mature Technology]
    H --> I[TRL 9: Commercialization]
